Company.description: Represents a company in the system

fields.cnpj: The unique national identifier for the company
fields.name: The name of the company
fields.contact: A list of contact numbers for the company
fields.location: The physical address of the company

Carrier.description: Represents a carrier in the system, a specialized type of company

fields.cnpj: The unique national identifier for the carrier

Seller.description: Represents a seller in the system, a specialized type of company

fields.cnpj: The unique national identifier for the seller
fields.selling_prods: A list of product IDs that this seller sells
fields.promoting_prods: A list of product IDs that this seller promotes

Product.description: Represents a product in the system

fields.product_id: The unique identifier for the product
fields.name: The name of the product
fields.image_urls: A list of URLs to images of the product
fields.sold_by: A list of seller IDs who sell this product
fields.promoted_by: A list of seller IDs who promote this product

Order.description: Represents an order in the system

fields.order_id: The unique identifier for the order
fields.order_date: The date and time when the order was placed
fields.observations: Any observations associated with the order
fields.order_user_id: The unique identifier of the user who placed the order
fields.paid_by: A list of payment methods used to pay for the order
fields.cascade_order: A list of orders that are associated with this order

PaymentMethod.description: Represents a payment method in the system

fields.payment_id: The unique identifier for the payment method
fields.had_by: A list of user IDs who have this payment method
fields.pays_order: A list of order IDs that this payment method was used to pay for

User.description: Represents a user in the system

fields.cpf: The unique national identifier for the user
fields.name: The name of the user
fields.email: The email address of the user
fields.password: The encrypted password of the user
fields.addresses: A list of addresses associated with the user
fields.phone_number: A list of phone numbers associated with the user
fields.makes_order: A list of order IDs that this user made
fields.has_payment: A list of payment method IDs that this user has

Sells.description: Represents a sell relation between a seller and a product

fields.cnpj: The unique national identifier for the seller
fields.product_id: The unique identifier for the product
fields.stock: The number of units in stock
fields.finish_date: The end date of the selling period

Promotes.description: Represents a promotion relation between a seller and a product

fields.cnpj: The unique national identifier for the seller
fields.product_id: The unique identifier for the product
fields.start_date: The start date of the promotion
fields.finish_date: The end date of the promotion

HasPaymentMethod.description: Represents a relation between a user and a payment method

fields.user_id: The unique identifier for the user
fields.payment_method_id: The unique identifier for the payment method
fields.payment_type: The type of the payment method

Pays.description: Represents a payment relation between a payment method and an order

fields.payment_method_id: The unique identifier for the payment method
fields.order_id: The unique identifier for the order

OrderHas.description: Represents an order item in the system

fields.order_id: The unique identifier for the order
fields.carrier_id: The unique national identifier for the carrier
fields.seller_id: The unique national identifier for the seller
fields.product_id: The unique identifier for the product
fields.tracking: The tracking number for the order item
fields.quantity: The number of units of the product in the order
fields.shipping_fee: The shipping fee for the order item
fields.delivery_date: The expected delivery date for the order item
